Camera.Flash:: Laser AF, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama
Camera.Second camera:: 50 MP, 71mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, dual-pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom

Design.Materials:: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), aluminum frame
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Design.Resistance::
IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
MIL-STD-810H compliant*
* does not guarantee ruggedness or use in extreme conditions

Battery.Charging::
90W wired
50W wireless
10W reverse wireless
5W reverse wired

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Cellular.SIM type:: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 7 major Android upgrades

Multimedia.Speakers:: Yes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
